segments.text: Can I ask you a question ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you get along with the American students in your classes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t have much contact with them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Why not ? Don ’ t you go up and talk to them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don ’ t . I ’ m too afraid of making mistakes in English . I don ’ t want to be laughed at .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You won ’ t get anywhere that way . You ’ re the one who needs to practice English , so you should make the first move . Besides , most American students are really friendly and outgoing . They will be glad to talk to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for the advice . I guess you ’ re right . It ’ s just hard to overcome my shyness . I really will try from now on . I promise .
segments.speaker: S2
